question.body: Which of the following is a result of the rate of cell division slowing with old age?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Wrinkling is because of the breakdown of elastin.
Incorrect. A paler appearance is because of less active melanocytes.
Incorrect. The weakening of muscles has to do with atrophy, not cell division.
Correct. Since cells are not dividing as quickly, it takes more time for a wound to close.
